===============

**Tender Description**
-------------------

**Project Title**: Weapons Storage Units with Components

**Reference Number**: WS3765676682-Doc3784195606

**Solicitation Number**: WS3765676682

**Tender Announcement Date**: December 9, 2022

**Closing Date**: January 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Location**: South Western Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

The Department of National Defence (DND) – 31 Canadian Brigade Group (31 CBG) invites proposals for the supply and delivery of weapons storage solutions for 3 weapons vaults in South-western Ontario. The storage solutions must accommodate various weapons systems and must be capable of housing a multitude of equipment and weaponry of different sizes and specifications.

**Key Tender Requirements**
---------------------------

* Supply and delivery of upright weapons storage units to accommodate vault sizes
* Internal storage unit components to maximize efficiency of space
* Ability to house various weapons systems and accommodate different sizes and specifications of equipment and weaponry
* Delivery to multiple locations in South-western Ontario

**Tender Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------------

The bid will be evaluated based on the following mandatory requirements:

* Technical Specifications
* Pricing
* Demonstration of compliance with all mandatory evaluation criteria

The bidder must submit supporting documentation to demonstrate compliance with all mandatory evaluation criteria.
